name: 네오위즈홀딩스
info:
• 简体中文名: NEOWIZ HOLDINGS
  • 别名: NEOWIZ控股有限公司
  • 别名: NEOWIZ HOLDINGS Corporation
  • 别名: 네오위즈홀딩스
  • 别名: 주식회사 네오위즈
  • 生日: 1997-05-28
  • 引用来源: http://www.neowiz.com
  • 地址: 13487 경기도 성남시 분당구 대왕판교로645번길 14 네오위즈판교타워
  • 持有公司: (주)네오위즈게임즈
  • 持有公司: (주)네오위즈인터넷
  • 持有公司: (주)네오위즈아이엔에스
  • 持有公司: (주)네오위즈인베스트먼트
  • 持有公司: (주)네오위즈모바일
  • 持有公司: (주)네오위즈랩
  • Copyright: @NEOWIZ HOLDINGS Corp. All rights reserved.
detail:
NEOWIZ HOLDINGS是一家控股企业，其公司名是一个合成词，是由NEO（新）和WIZARD（巫师）合成的。1997年5月28日由나성균成立公司“新世界的精灵”（韩语：새로운 세상의 마법사）。
2017.03                Changed corporate name of NEOWIZ GAMES Corp. to NEOWIZ
2014.01                Moved into a new company building ‘NEOWIZ PANGYO TOWER’ situated in Pangyo
2013.03                Changed corporate name to NEOWIZ HOLDINGS Corp.
2012.12                NEOWIZ INS Corp. and NNA underwent a merger and combined into NEOWIZ INS Corp.
        04                NEOWIZ MOBILE Corp. and mobile division of PENTAVISION Corp. underwent a merger and combined into NEOWIZ MOBILE Corp.
2010.05                Made public the new corporate identity of the company
        04                NEOWIZ BUGS Corp. and NEOWIZ INTERNET Corp. underwent a merger and combined into NEOWIZ INTERNET Corp.
        03                Moved into a new company building ‘NEOWIZ Tower’ situated in Bundang
2009.10                NEOWIZ BUGS Corp. listed on KOSDAQ (IPO)
        03                Founded the NEOWIZ FOUNDATION
2008.12                Music Portal Services ‘Bugs’ and ‘Jukeon’ combined into ‘Bugs (www.bugs.co.kr)’
2007.04                NEOWIZ GAMES Corp. listed on KOSDAQ (IPO)
        04                Established NEOWIZ GAMES Corp., NEOWIZ INTERNET Corp., and NEOWIZ INVESTMENT Corp.
        02                Created a holding company
2004.08                Opened ‘Jukeon’, a music portal
2003.08                Launched ‘Pmang’, a game portal (www.pmang.com)
2000.11                Launched ‘Avatar’, the world’s first fee-based online character service of ‘SayClub’
        06                Listed on KOSDAQ (IPO)
1999.07                Launched ‘SayClub’ (www.sayclub.com), the world’s first web-based chatting community
1997.12                Invented ‘Oneclick’, the world’s first instant internet access technology
        05                Established NEOWIZ Corporation
